transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello. Good morning sir.
Customer: Good morning boliye.
Executive: Lakshman baat kar raha tha sir.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Sir aapki ek ticket aayi thi sir uske regarding call kiya tha. Sir kya any problem sir koi problem face kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Problem nahi hai.
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Ab wo mujhe company ke manager se baat karni hai kaun hai waha pe.
Executive: Actually kya hai ki ab aapka jo pehle account manager the sir wo to promote ho chuke hain sir. Wo to sir ab aapke account manager nahi ho payenge sir. Aapki aapka yahi concern hai na sir?
Customer: Haan lekin mujhe baat karni hai manager se actually kyunki manager ne hi plan liya tha payment karne se pehle unko bola tha.
Customer: Ki main ye plan fir se le raha hun renew kara raha hun. Ji.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Main payment tabhi karunga mera manager change nahi hona chahiye. Unhone bola theek hai tumhara yahi manager rahega. Fir mujhe payment kar diya aur ek do mahina hi hua hai aur mujhe bina bataye change kyun kiya usko. Chalo change kar diya koi baat nahi mujhe manager se baat kara do bas.
Executive: Nahi sir. Okay sir main apne manager se aapki baat kara deta hun. Lekin sir aisi baat nahi hai ki matlab hum aapko service nahi denge sir aisi baat nahi hai.
Customer: Baat service ki nahi hai sir aisa nahi hota hai aap log kis liye baithe hote ho waha pe. Sir hamare liye baithe ho na. Bilkul bilkul.
Executive: Bilkul.
Customer: Hamare liye baithe ho na ab jab aapse hamara jam jata hai set ho jata hai sab fir aap change kar doge to kaise chalega. Sir ek baat bataiye sir abhi aapse chalo main chalo main aisa nahi bol raha. Abhi aap bol rahe ho change nahi wo ho nahi payenge to koi baat nahi mujhe aapke sath hi karna padega theek hai chalo aapke sath abhi mujhe jam gaya ek saal hone ke baad aapko hata denge kisi naye ko la denge aise thodi hota hai.
Executive: Nahi main sir samajh sakta hun aapki jo bhav sir kisi ke sath jo feeling matlab wo attach ho jati hai na wo alag hi hoti hai. Relation relationship manager ka matlab kya hai ki wo kisi se relation banata hai wo fir uska kaam acche se karta hai ab relation acha ho jata hai uske baad tum hata dete ho kisi ko bhi dusre ko la ke rakh dete ho fir matlab kya hai relationship manager ka.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Nahi sir aapki feelings ko sir samajh sakta hun aap aap matlab aapka kafi acha unse bonding ho gaya tha main aapki sir feelings ki respect karta hun lekin sir kya hai ki ab jab koi person promote ho jata hai sir to kya hai ki ab dekho wo to promote ho gaye hain. To ab to sir wo.
Customer: Promote ho gaye to unka kaam kya hai chalo promote hone ke baad wo kya karenge ab?
Executive: Nahi sir actually na ye kaam karenge ya dusra kuch kaam karenge ab wo?
Customer: Haan dusra kaam karenge na sir wo.
Executive: Dusra kaam karenge matlab ab ab dusre bande ka account pakdenge wo?
Executive: Nahi sir account nahi ab dekho pehle sir wo the kya hai ki RM the aapke jaise ki hamare paas aapka data hota hai ki kam se kam ek bande ke paas 100 logon ka data hota hai. To kya hai ki wo us pe work karte the. Ab ab wo ab unke under puri team hai sir. Hmm theek hai to kya kya hai ki ab ab wo matlab jo account manager hote hain unko handle karte hain sir unse matlab matlab wo kya account manager unhe report karte hain. To ab wo promote ho chuke hain to sir actually aisa nahi ki.
Customer: Haan main aapke apne account manager se baat karwa deta hun. Haan unse baat kara dijiye na chalo.
Executive: Haan. Sir sir sir call lena sir wo apna account manager se baat karna chahte hain sir wo wo promote ho chuke hain.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan good morning sir bataiye.
Customer: Haan good morning sir. Ji boliye Himanshu baat kar raha hun.
Executive: Kaun sir?
Customer: Himanshu baat kar raha hun sir.
Executive: Himanshu ji. Ji ji boliye. Himanshu ji maine.
Customer: Sir suno to jo Aditya hai na Aditya ab account manager nahi reh gaya sir wo promote ho gaya hai to abhi wo account handle nahi karta koi na koi dusra person hi handle karega right agar koi dikkat ho to IndiaMART mein hi hai aur Vivek hai hi aur Aditya kabhi bhi aap call kar sakte ho koi dikkat ho to but wo aapka ab account handle nahi kar sakta matlab unki team mein jo bhi honge wo handle karenge directly unke paas koi ab account nahi hoga sir wo promote ho gaye hain sir is mahine.
Customer: Wo baat sahi hai Vivek ji hai na Vivek ji se puchna hai aap Vivek ji se puchna hai meri kya baat hui thi. Vivek ji ke Lakshman Vivek ke under mein hi kaam kar raha hai to Vivek hai. Par wo baat nahi hai main wo nahi bol raha hun. Haan wo theek hai chalo aapne bata diya ye baaten ab wo handle nahi kar payenge to mujhe Lakshman ji se hi karna padega kaam lekin meri kya baat hai wo sun lijiye aap. Vivek agar matlab agar Lakshman nahi handle kar paya to Vivek handle kar lega. Vivek ji se puchiye pehle meri kya baat hui thi kyunki plan maine unke paas se hi renew karwaya tha. Chaliye theek hai to ek baar main Vivek aata to Vivek se baat karwa deta hun aapki Vivek meri baat to suniye aap pehle puri. Haan boliye boliye aap pehle meri baat to sun lijiye puri. Vivek ji se meri kya baat hui thi plan renew karane se pehle ki main renew kara raha hun mera account manager change nahi hona chahiye unhone bola theek hai sir aapko aapka account manager change nahi hoga yahi manager rahega aap jab tak chahoge. Theek hai renew karaya do mahina hi hua hai shayad abhi mujhe. Hmm. Abhi Diwali ke pehle hi karaya maine. Haan pata hai do mahina hi hua hai mujhe mujhe bataya bhi nahi aur mera manager change kar diya aapne. Nahi nahi to sir agar wo promote ho gaye hai nahi available to is vajah se change hua na koi jaan bujh ke change thodi hua. To fir mujhe Vivek ji ne aisa kyun bola ki wo ha aapka yahi account manager rahenge. Haan account manager rahenge but wo hai na abhi promoted hai na sir is vajah se wo directly handle nahi kar sakte koi account. Abhi Vivek to hai hi na aapke sath. Vivek to hai Vivek ji se kabhi itni baat hi nahi hui meri ye to jab renew karana tabhi hui hai. Dekho main koi problem nahi hai Lakshman ji se bhi koi problem nahi hai main kisi se problem agar wo rehte ji kya hai unko knowledge tha stone ke bare mein mujhe kuch batana nahi padta tha. To kuch bhi help hoga wo kar denge koi dikkat nahi aayegi kuch bhi help hoga wo kar denge. Theek hai aisa thodi hota hai yaar abhi Lakshman ji chalo mere sath fir set ho jayenge wo ek saal fir uske baad ek saal do saal ke baad Lakshman ji ko hata doge tum. Sir services to ek hi saal ke liye hai aapne sir. Wo nahi bol raha main service ek saal ke liye liye hai to main ek saal se thodi hun IndiaMART mein chalo batao ek saal se hun kya main. Nahi nahi to sir dekho kuch process agar koi company chod ke chala gaya right koi promote ho gaya kisi ka department change ho to us case mein there is in the sense in the case ki wo yaha pe available hai to hum nahi change kar rahe but ye to aisa hai force circumstances hai na ki wo abki handle kar nahi sakte wo abki executive nahi ho promoted ho wo RM ban chuke hain manager ban chuke hain to directly handle nahi karenge na koi bhi cases ye main aapse kehna chahta hu ye baat maine Aditya ji se khud se boli thi to unhone bhi bola tha ki nahi main rahunga aap tension mat lijiye sir wo kya karun ab promote ho gaya kya nahi wo karte kaise kare bataiye to abhi to aapko dekho services mein koi gap milega to fir bataiye na abhi koi dikkat aayegi nahi bataate rahenge help karte rahenge aapko koi problem nahi aayegi koi gap nahi aayegi. Gap ka koi sawal nahi hai wo kya hai kabhi kabhi mujhe bolna nahi padta tha wo khud hi mere account ko har weekly har weekend week ke end mein wo mere account ko khud check karte the aur ha to abhi bhi aise koi bhi problem aayega to aap bol dijiyega Vivek ko karwa dunga aisa nahi hai ki IndiaMART mein nahi hai IndiaMART mein hai wo main karwa dunga usme koi gap nahi aayega aap bol dijiyega Lakshman bhi help kar dega koi dikkat nahi aayegi sir. Keh to raha hun koi problem nahi aayegi aapko koi sa bhi Vivek hai abhi available. Aur Aditya bhi hai but ha unka matlab promotion ho gaya bas to yhi changes hai. Chal lenge Aditya ji se ek baar baat kara dena meri. Theek hai main baat karwa dunga. Ek baar Aditya ko hello. Hello. Haan ji sir. Theek hai koi baat nahi aap account aap dekh lena bhai ek baar Aditya ji se baat kara dena aur unse puch lena main to aapko aur bhi samajh aa jayegi mere account mein kya karna rehta hai kya hai to Aditya ji aapko bhi bata denge. Theek hai sir. Hai na aur ek baar baat kara dijiye agar ho to mujhe Aditya ji se waha pe. Ek minute sir main abhi. Hello. Haan. Hello. Sir bol rahe hain ki wo wo unhe bol denge ki aapse connect kar le. Hmm. Nahi wo to wo to connect to main bhi kar lunga direct unse. Haan. Accha accha nahi main bhi unse connect kar lunga main abhi unka number le lunga agar unko kyunki wo aapke profile ko acche se samajhte hain to main unse bhi connect mein rahunga. Theek hai. Theek hai sir. Meri parso hi baat hui thi whatsapp pe baat hui thi to maine bola tha main parso monday ko call karunga unhone bola theek hai. Nahi sir agar aapko koi concern ho to sir mujhe aap direct call kar sakte hain mera hi number hai. Thoda ticket raise mat kijiye please. Kyunki nahi ticket raise wo to maine unse baat karne ke liye kiya tha. Accha. Haan wo koi complaint karne ke liye nahi kiya aapki complaint aaj tak maine kisi ki ki hi nahi hai mujhe koi problem hi nahi hai kisi se. Chalo koi baat nahi sir agar aapko koi concern ho to sir aap mujhe directly contact kar sakte hain aisi baat nahi hai. Okay theek hai chalo. Okay sir main aapke kehne se sir ye ticket close kar dun. Haan kar dijiye close koi baat nahi. Haan sir us pe sir aapke mail pe aayega sir us pe satisfy mark kar dena. Okay sir. Us pe whatsapp pe aayega whatsapp pe theek hai sir. Haan haan haan haan theek hai theek hai sir. Theek hai sir bye sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to talk to the previous account manager.

- Expressed concern about frequent manager changes.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the previous manager's promotion.

- Assured continued support despite the manager change.

- Offered to connect the customer with the new manager.

- Agreed to close the ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect customer with previous manager.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- account manager, promotion, support, ticket, resolution
